response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed all your expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. We believe its worth far surpasses its tangible cost, making it an invaluable asset for any discerning individual like yourself.

We are offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive opportunity allows you to experience the unparalleled quality and craftsmanship we stand for, while securing a significant savings compared to the market value.

Please consider this offer carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We would be delighted to discuss the details with you personally.

Looking forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you,

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
